website_summaries.verdict: These pans are a little pricier, but they come with extras. If you're looking for everything you need to make donuts at home, this is your best bet.
pros: Set comes with full-size donut pan and mini donut pan, plus 5 disposable piping bags, and silicone spatula
Sturdy for silicone pans while still being nonstick and easy to clean
cons: Some buyers feel mini pan is too shallow even for mini-size donuts

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this, but I don't hate it. I wanted something slightly smaller than regular donuts, but man, these things are minuscule. They are smaller than Hostess Donettes, even when filled to the brim. The spatula is really nice and sturdy as well as the mold itself. Also, using the piping bags was 100% necessary and actually made it really easy to fill the cavities as well as easier on clean up. It would almost make sense to have more than one of these to do multiple batches at a time, but I don't think I liked it enough to spend more money on the same mediocre product.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!
customer_reviews.text: I lightly sprayed w/Pam and donut doesn't stick! Love the cleanup ! I was a baker for several years & I must be honest-I tried the donut recipe that comes with the set and daycare kids & my family didn't like it. Well seriously--we need our chocolate!! Found an awesome recipe Easy Baked Glazed Choc Doughnuts from Errens Kitchens {pinterest} & topped it with the Nutella Glaze your recipe had posted. YUM!! Pans will hold up for years!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula's Daycare

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan but I used it the first time after reading the enclosed paper and did not spray/grease it and the whole pan of donuts stuck so always spray!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Even "sticky" works fine...
customer_reviews.text: I made this recipe (Pineapple Upside-Down Donuts), wondering how the mold would react to very hot melted sugar and pineapple slices on the bottom. No worries. The donuts came out just fine, and the mold still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hillefeld

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to work with than a traditional metal pan. I also really appreciated the addition of pastry bags and a spatula to the order. I had everything I needed in one package. Really appreciated the ease and would definitely purchase more products from this thoughtful company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Promised recipes do not exist.
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to find an insert with a few cleaning and use instructions. On that insert I was told to check the email they sent after my purchase or to visit chefast.com/donut-tips for recipes and more instructions. Great!! Except there is no such page and no email was sent. There are only 4 “recipes” on their website. Only 2 involved food-chicken soup and banana bread. So I will have to figure it out on my own. Color me less than completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I found a recipe for donuts and decided I needed a donut pan. When I saw this cute mini pan I had to try it! It arrived quickly and nicely packaged and the pastry bags that were included were so helpful for filling the small sections of the pan - in fact, using a pastry bag is crucial because the donuts are so small. It worked well, was easy to use, nothing stuck, cooked well, and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever set of silicone pans and I was not disappointed! My first time using them, I was baking low carb donuts, which can be a little more fragile than regular donuts. After cooling, they easily popped out of the pans pretty much with out a problem. Even out of the miniature donut pan, too! I was pretty impressed actually. They were very easy to use and cleanup was a breeze, especially! Also, I thought the follow up email from the company was a nice personal touch. I would definitely buy these pans again, if I needed to!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it and used it for a birthday cake I was making.
customer_reviews.author: Invisible Mother

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the Chefast pans!
customer_reviews.text: I run a small keto bakery out of my house and I have tried several of the mini doughnut pans. The Chefast brand by far is the best I have used! My mini keto bagels come out so easily and there is nothing left in the pan so I know my customers will be getting their moneys worth. I also love the fact that I didn’t have to scrub the pan in order to clean it... It was so easy to clean. I will definitely be only using their pans!
customer_reviews.author: limur94

customer_reviews.title: This Mini donuts set is just right
customer_reviews.text: Set came well packaged and all advertised parts inside This is my first mini donut pan - it’s smaller than I realized but exactly the right size for making bite size donuts - I used the recipe emailed from the company and they turned out quite delicious. I have used some recipes off Pinterest and they came out great. I recommend this product if you are looking for a beginners set with the pastry bags , spatula and silicone pan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Try this. You'll be pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once so far but I'm excited to learn and improve my donuts. Recipe is easy to use and taste great. Very glad to have this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mdone

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: I've never made doughnuts before so I didn't know what sort of pan I needed to get. After a bit id research, I found out a silicone mold helps the best with baking. The first time I used it after cleaning it was great, it cooks the batter evenly when it's in the oven and it's really easy to remove the doughnuts from the pan. I've used it again since then and I plan on using it more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work that well for me. Used the recipe that was included as part of the purchase. It also wasnt that easy to clean. It didnt work for me, but im sure others may think its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Talia K

customer_reviews.title: High quality set.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received this set. It is the first silicone cookware set I have used and I really like it. It's high quality, light weight and easy to fill with the bags included. Ir's nonstick and easy to clean. I'm going to enjoy baking with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Doughnut Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Doughnut plan works really well, and doughnuts release easily. I find you get a fuller doughnut if you fill about 3/4 full. Spatula is ok but could be more bendable. I haven’t used the piping bags as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Akilah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pan for baking a multitude of things
customer_reviews.text: Just about anything you want to bake in a mold can be made in this donut pan. It's been perfect for my recipe for individual serving Oven Baked Mushroom Rice, an adaptable mold for my Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars, and next I'll be trying my individual mini-Cheesecakes recipe with a graham cracker/butter crust that I'll push into the mold. Baked donuts do taste different from fried but they're still very good. This pan is easy to clean - I wash by hand - easy to use. Going to order another + some pastry bags - got bunches of grandkids to feed! A+ product
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis from Youngstown, Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I probably should have just gotten 2 larger size instead of combo pack as I can’t see ever using the smaller one but never say never maybe when there’s little people over I’ll try. I did use a cupcake scoop to fill the donut shapes but may use squeeze bottle next time
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Donuts & Bagels
customer_reviews.text: I had a variety of pans to choose from, but selected this one due to past reviews, and I am sooooo glad I did! My first recipe using the pan were Keto Donuts and they turned out amazing! Love this pan, and going to use it for bagels as well. I spray all pans with Coconut Oil first, just to ensure an easy removal, and they slid right out!
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the regular and the mini pan, and I love both! I'm definitely not a pro baker, and these pans take some getting used to....but the results are super cute! I found that cooking/baking spray was absolutely necessary, and while it's safer to bake them with a pan underneath, I think they turned out better without the pan. Overall, these are super fun and the end product are beautiful baked donuts!
customer_reviews.author: SevSos18

customer_reviews.title: Help!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had fabulous success the first time I used them. Then the second time, I had complete and utter crumbling. So I did some research, and tried again, again complete and total crumbling failure. What am I doing wrong. Oiled the cups, no oil in the cups, didn't matter...total crumbling mess. HELP!!!!! I am re-rating these pans. After discussing the issues with Daniel from Chefast, I used butter to coat the doughnut cups, and my doughnuts came out much much better. Now with fingers crossed, I will attempt other doughnut batters.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Varner-Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Durability, ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The chefast non stick donut pans are easily one of the best baking related purchases I’ve made. My significant other and I recently began experimenting with donut recipes and these pans are so durable and easy to use. One of the first things I noticed when I removed the pans from the box was how durable they are. We also own another set of donut pans and the other set definitely is not of the same quality. Definitely would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make mini bite sized donuts to place on top of my standard size cupcakes and they were the perfect size! I like to place it on a baking sheet just for more stability and it makes it easier to put it in the oven and to take out. Using cooking spray will also help release the donuts from their compartments. It's also very easy to wash. I'll definitely order more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bake time for some, was not right.
customer_reviews.text: The pans are great. Had a few minor issues, though. 4 did not come out in one piece. Part broke off. The bake time, was way off, for some of them. 3 or 4 I actually put back in the oven 3 times, as they were still raw in the middle. They were the ones that were towards the middle of the pan. Ended up with more, than the recipe stated. Used the recipe that they suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Calnan

customer_reviews.title: Donuts turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: First time making baked cake donuts. They popped out easily and donuts turned out great! These types of pans tend to be a little harder to clean by hand. So I’ll just be using the dishwasher to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiaaddie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Easy to get finished donuts out of molds
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised on time. Worked great. Easy to get finished donuts out of molds.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not so happy with it for one I thought it was going to be like a metal pan not silicone. I don't like how it cleans up with a pain in the rear end so hopefully I won't have a problem returning it. I hate to be so negative about things so if everything turned out wonderful with you with this I'm really happy for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable , easy to use, easy to clean. After a few minutes of cooling, the doughnuts pop right out. Heavy silicone, easy to handle, putting in and out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Everything stuck in the pan. Even after spraying with oil. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought a doughnut mix also on amazon and did not check the recipe they suggested so I can’t talk to that. The pan worked as advertised very easy to clean and the doughnuts fell right out when I turned them over on the cooling sheet. I did use a cooking spray on the sheet. I love this product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua lindvall

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this for crafts instead of baking and it works great!! Sold material made well! Very nice item for kitchen or crafts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Did not have good luck with this. Donuts didn't bake even with added time. Would not buy again. Stick with non stick metal pans.
customer_reviews.author: Kate G Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun
customer_reviews.text: I had way too much fun making mini donuts for a work event. They come out of the form easily and the recipe that came with it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite non-stick.
customer_reviews.text: So these are pretty similar texture to other silicone baking dishes that I have but they are definitely not non-stick for some reason. I used the regular size and the mini with different donut recipes and they had bits and chunks stuck all inside. I like the sizes though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: When it said full size donuts, bagels etc. I was thinking they would be regular size, but these molds make mini (small) donuts / bagels. Definitely not the size to use for a sandwich . I do like that it came with a bunch of pastry bags - these were very useful.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMatteo

customer_reviews.title: The directions and tips were great and the pans themselves were easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Every you need to make baked mini-donuts was included. The directions and tips were great and the pans themselves were easy to use. My donuts were the hit of the gathering. I even received recipes for additional types of donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for resin art
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this mold with the intention on using it for my resin molds and it work incredibly well. I love the glossy finish in the inside of the mold so when my pieces are done they shine with no extra work to it.
customer_reviews.author: ieasion

customer_reviews.title: This is a great donut pan for baking!
customer_reviews.text: A+ for easy to clean! The "pan" is a nice quality silicone, fairly thick. I bought this pan to bake gluten-free donuts and it works very well with my recipe. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to make low carb bagels
customer_reviews.text: It is great I can make my low carb bagels in there and they come out great!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeniseMFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comes apart for easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have started a keto diet and they actually are very versatile for many of my desserts. They are very well made and I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Boone

customer_reviews.title: Works great for mini donuts.
customer_reviews.text: I've never cooked with silicone before so getting used to the different cook times. No fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: kim calderon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I love that it came with piping ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love that it came with piping bags, a spatula and recipes! The donuts I made turned out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt give it give stars because the silicone tote in a few places after the first use. But I use this as a resin mold so that could be the issue.
customer_reviews.author: William Jesus

customer_reviews.title: ... additional emails received from Chefast regarding instructions on how best to care for my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with additional emails received from Chefast regarding instructions on how best to care for my purchase, helpful tips for best practices to get better donuts and recipes for donuts and glazes.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2Bhere

customer_reviews.title: No Mess Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet as I just received it. I do like the size andd weight and the non-stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: mary e hayes

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't made donuts before, do them now. This silicone donut pan is great whether your donuts are high test or keto. The price makes it easy to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: robb quick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oven safe, easy to clean, and make a perfect bagle, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stafford

customer_reviews.title: product received as described
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but I received everything like was stated in your ad. Thanks for checking.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn kalaher

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make bagels, cupcakes and an oatmeal breakfast bread. Great size, cooks evenly and works for a variety of batters and dough
customer_reviews.author: Alison L. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: These pans did not allow the donuts to be removed, at all. We have a very disappointed 12 year old over here.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great silicone mini donut pan
customer_reviews.text: If using the included pastry bags this donut pan is very easy to fill and the donuts come out perfect!! I have found so many sugar free recipes and sub almond flour to make it even more healthy! I would like to thank Chefast for making this a combo item!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to follow the pre-use instructions and wash items to clean off any residue.
customer_reviews.text: I've never worked with silicon until now. What a great idea. The donuts were awesome and the removal and cleanup was a breeze. These products will get a lot of use. Thanks Chefast! My husband loves donuts and now he shall have his heart's desire.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie KE0VAL

customer_reviews.title: Great Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Makes great, healthy donuts. I purchased to make Keto Donuts, but I did make donuts for my kids (non-healthy), but baked is better than fried. They ate them up in no time. Very easy to clean and use..
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Strange donut pan
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what I will ever use is for. Small for donuts, and will make strange shaped ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Peachblossom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to use, did not give off any odor and arrive in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Put silicone pan on top of a cookie sheet
customer_reviews.text: Though nothing sticks to the individual cavities the silicone is difficult to remove the residue from the cooking spray
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans!! I've been a baking fool since I got them, lol. My grandkids just won't let me keep the donuts I make, and eat them almost as fast as I bake them. Thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen LeDoux

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the pan set! I do desserts and I can wait to use it to make some mini desserts. Thank you for the recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using this for casting resin jewelry. It's the perfect size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my keto friendly Donuts. Make sure you push up from the bottom in the center lifting the donut up out of the hole. This will make it easier to remove them instead of having it crumble as you try to peel it out.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Hunter

customer_reviews.title: easey to clean and use....nothing left to say!
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea these silicone pans were just as efficient yet much easier to clean than a traditional doughnut pan. I am now a huge fan and making gluten-free, dairy-free donuts on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company and product.
customer_reviews.text: The best customer service from the company. Received a donut recipe that is wonderful as well as other important information on the product. Very impressed and love the product. Will most definitely purchase again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Donut Maker
customer_reviews.text: This shiny sleek mold is the mold of molds. It has fantastic thickness. It does not feel flimsy in any way shape or form. I know i will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Enerson

customer_reviews.title: Baby donuts!
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes the cutest LITTLE donuts! My kids and their friends just love them! Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: its a gift
customer_reviews.text: I havent used this.. I bought the pan as a gift for xmas for my neice..she wanted to make mini donuts for her son
customer_reviews.author: Pat A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great donut pans!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased and used both the regular as well as mini sized pans. Both worked great and my littles love putting the mini donuts on their fingers as if they are rings :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product name is misleading. "Silicone non-stick pan" would've been more appropriate instead of writing it as a small detail. I just got it today, was surprised that it wasn't an actual pan.
customer_reviews.author: em W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to make some mini donuts (my kids prefer fried however). I enjoyed the baked donuts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Works great and I love the depth of each.
customer_reviews.author: Vonny

customer_reviews.title: Love them and have used them more than once now ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them and have used them more than once now and is a treat for myself once in awhile since I have a special diet I have to stick with
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nuss

customer_reviews.title: RIP off many items missing
customer_reviews.text: I only got the one small donut pan all the other items were not included in the shipment. This was a complete rip off. I would like either the other items sent or a full immediate credit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the littles!
customer_reviews.text: What fun with the g-kiddos! Perfect size for little hands & tummies.
customer_reviews.author: jettebeen

customer_reviews.title: Great company and product
customer_reviews.text: This product is the easiest pan to clean, nothing burns, and the recipes that were sent to us via email were amazing! I have a child with severe food allergies so we can finally make him special donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Kotzmoyer

customer_reviews.title: Product works perfectly, seller is extremely accessible
customer_reviews.text: The kids and I made doughnuts immediately after we popped this baby out of the package. I used an oil spray, and the doughnuts came out easily. Afterward, it was simple to clean. We've made doughnuts three times so far, and all has turned out well. The seller has sent personalized messages and a PDF with tips and recipes too. Great experience overall!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but I haven’t had a chance to use them yet. I have a friend that has these and swears by them (hence why I bought my own set).
customer_reviews.author: F. Cully

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love baking and this were an awesome addition to my baking gadgets!
customer_reviews.author: PerrPair

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this specifically for Christmas. She is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Profound Joy

customer_reviews.title: ... for the right shaped donut but after that they're perfect! Pans clean up easily and really are non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Took a few trays to figure out how far to fill the pans for the right shaped donut but after that they're perfect! Pans clean up easily and really are non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean however my keto bagels pop right out of it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baking friendly
customer_reviews.text: I make Keto friendly donuts and these has been a help. It is easy to use and also easy to clean. Donut dough does not stick when done unlike other pans
customer_reviews.author: Coralis Mejias

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: the product is great...I bake for a restaurant...that is vegan and gluten free...these little donut molds are perfect for holding the baked mix together...and making something look good...
customer_reviews.author: donna lee

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: I will write a better review when I actually use them. They arrived one time and they seem pretty sturdy so I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bucaro

customer_reviews.title: This product is exactly as described.  Well made and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use with resin crafting it works perfectly. A dream to use with resin. I would like to see another one from this company in a lighter color so that I can better see the inclusions that I put in my resin.
customer_reviews.author: JOT0122

customer_reviews.title: easy donuts with kids
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that we could easily make healthy donuts and they cooked evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky  Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! Fast shipper too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice silicone pan, heavy and sturdy, sent me some helpful tips, quality seller.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie R. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making my 2 point WW 2 ingredient bagels!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Dick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Resin jewellery making and it is wonderful, exactly what I wanted. I think I will have to purchase another one soon though to make donuts with as my adult daughter has taken a liking to it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Mortimore

customer_reviews.title: was ok
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too impressed with the product I found easier ways to make donuts
customer_reviews.author: Steven and Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Donut Pans!
customer_reviews.text: Both the small and large pans work awesome! The donuts turned out fantastic! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and work wonderfully. I made donuts as soon as they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Schuberg

customer_reviews.title: Donut silicone
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to clean and it made perfect donuts
customer_reviews.author: Julie Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal and very useful if you're wanting to make healthy versions of the foods you love!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D. E. McConnaughey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I made a Keto bagels 🥯 in it and it worked great, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rydzanich

customer_reviews.title: Donuts were perfect
customer_reviews.text: Catches all lint and if you have pets it will catch hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect donuts
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just don't overfill. Mini donuts came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shagufta

customer_reviews.title: This is not metal!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting metal ..... but it’s silicon...i like the donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Moni Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to release donuts
customer_reviews.text: I piped gluten-free donut batter into these & baked in my toaster oven. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Baker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Donuts anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Has all the parts and recipes Great product
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. Seefeld

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service  and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my wife. She loves making donuts with our 3 yr old son. Look forward to seeing her use it! And our son can enjoy bit size donuts now :)
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Love the donut pan
customer_reviews.text: I made chocolate donuts for my son and they came out perfect in this pan. I am looking forward to making more donuts in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGirl

product_meta.title: Chefast Non-Stick Donut Pan Combo Kit: BPA-Free Large and Mini Silicone Doughnut Pans, Spatula, and 5 Pastry Bags - Baking Molds for Full-Size and Small Donuts - Bagels and Doughnuts Maker Set
feature_bullets: YOUR PERFECT DONUT PAN KIT: With a large, professional grade donut pan, five pastry bags, and even recommended baking tips and recipes, you’ll have everything you need to create any full-size doughnut your heart desires, right out of the box. It’s the perfect gift for any baker who hasn’t yet added scrumptious donuts to their repertoire.

SUPER-QUALITY NON-STICK PAN: Our full-size, nine-hole and twelve-hole donut pan is made from BPA-free, 100%-food-grade, non-stick silicone with no fillers or harmful chemicals of any kind. It is dishwasher-, freezer-, and oven-safe up to 446 degrees and also passes the ‘pinch test’
READY TO BAKE: Our silicone donut pan also comes with five disposable piping bags so you can fill it in a snap.

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES: Use this pan for everything from doughnuts to bagels to cookies. Want to get a little more creative? How about frozen desserts, sushi donuts, or homemade soaps? Your imagination is the limit.

100% SATISFACTION: We back up our donut pan kit with a one-year warranty and a 60-day money-back guarantee. If anything goes wrong, a brand-new product or a full refund is just a few clicks away. There’s a whole world of donuts and other healthy treats out there just waiting for you to create them; order this special set by Chefast today!
